question:
You know that a building company is planning to build new houses in immediate proximity to your house. Write a letter to the manager of the company.
In your letter
– Say how you found out about their plan
– Describe how you feel about it
– Explain what you hope that they do about it
text: I am writing this letter in regards to your new houses construction project next to my house at 1300, Dallman Road, Innisfil.

Firstly, I requested your administration team for a detailed project plan and they have sent your architecture plan to my home. However, I  received an incorrect document and after frequent follow-ups, I received the right plan. I reached out to the local municipality for initial clarifications around area measurements which are almost addressed by local community members.

To explain further, Plan is incredible and very thoughtful. I am impressed and excited to see the new suburb next to my house; Nevertheless, I noticed you're blocking the fire way and the whole backyard is dedicated to the patio.

To address the above-mentioned issues, You can provide more space between my house and subsequent houses to allow fire vehicles to move freely in case of emergencies. I suggest you  reduce the patio size so that owners can use backyard space for gardening that will provide a green view from my balcony.
Please respond at your earliest convenience.
